Title: Measurement of H2O and OH in a flame by optical frequency comb spectroscopy
Abstract: © 2016 OSA.We measure broadband H2O and OH spectra in a flame using near-infrared cavity-enhanced Fourier transform optical frequency comb spectroscopy, we retrieve temperature and OH concentration, and compare water spectra to an improved line list.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
